name: The Fire Mage (Archangel of High Heavens)
name_original: The Fire Mage (Archangel of High Heavens)
description:
The Fire Mage is an Android app for Casual runner game. You can still try it out if it works. It is intended for Android Application only for now. Although, there is lot of improvements has to be made. I will try to make more improvements whenever I get time.

Thanks.
